divergences.description: agent_c flags the arenas/ ignore rule as a potential friction point requiring documentation or adjustment, while agent_b treats the existing ignore pattern as correct for the intended workflow.

rationale: Agent B provides the most precise and actionable re-audit, including the key README consensus-threshold mismatch and concrete diff fixes for stale sections. I would adopt its fixes and add my additional community-docs scope (CONTRIBUTING/SECURITY/CoC) plus a note about the README TODO list.
